mapper.select: SELECT u.gender, DATE_FORMAT(d.excerciseDay,'%y-%m-%d') as excerciseDay, d.equipmentName AS"excerciseName", e.equipmentEnglishName AS "excerciseEnglishName", ROUND((HOUR(TIMEDIFF(endtime, startTime)) * 60 )+ (second(TIMEDIFF(endtime, startTime)) + MINUTE(TIMEDIFF(endtime, startTime)) * 60) / 60) AS "excerciseTime", e.equipmentCategory AS "excerciseCategory", e.equipmentStimulate AS"excerciseStimulate", e.equipmentEnglishStimulate AS "excerciseEnglishStimulate", d.weightNow, d.countNow, (weightNow * countNow) AS "volume" FROM daily_excercise AS d INNER JOIN fitness_equipment AS e ON d.equipmentName = e.equipmentName INNER JOIN user AS u ON u.rfidKey = #{rfidKey} where d.rfidKey = #{rfidKey} and d.excerciseDay BETWEEN CONVERT( DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 4 DAY), DATE ) and CONVERT(NOW(), DATE) ORDER BY d.excerciseDay desc; SELECT ROUND(SUM(ABS(HOUR(TIMEDIFF(endtime, startTime)) * 60 )+ (second(TIMEDIFF(endtime, startTime)) + MINUTE(TIMEDIFF(endtime, startTime)) * 60) / 60)) AS "userTotalCategoryTime", e.equipmentCategory AS "excerciseCategory"from daily_excercise AS d LEFT JOIN fitness_equipment AS e ON d.equipmentName = e.equipmentName WHERE d.rfidKey = #{rfidKey} AND d.excerciseDay BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT((SELECT ADDDATE(NOW(), - WEEKDAY(NOW()) + 0 )), '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT((SELECT ADDDATE(NOW(), - WEEKDAY(NOW()) + 6 )), '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY e.equipmentCategory; SELECT ROUND(SUM(ABS(HOUR(TIMEDIFF(endtime, startTime)) * 60 )+ (second(TIMEDIFF(endtime, startTime)) + MINUTE(TIMEDIFF(endtime, startTime)) * 60) / 60)) AS "AllTotalCategoryTime", e.equipmentCategory AS "excerciseCategory"from daily_excercise AS d LEFT JOIN fitness_equipment AS e ON d.equipmentName = e.equipmentName where d.excerciseDay BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT((SELECT ADDDATE(NOW(), - WEEKDAY(NOW()) + 0 )), '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT((SELECT ADDDATE(NOW(), - WEEKDAY(NOW()) + 6 )), '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY e.equipmentCategory; SELECT ROUND(SUM(ABS(HOUR(TIMEDIFF(a.dailyExcerciseEnd, a.dailyExcerciseStart)) * 60 )+ (second(TIMEDIFF(a.dailyExcerciseEnd, a.dailyExcerciseStart)) + MINUTE(TIMEDIFF(a.dailyExcerciseEnd, a.dailyExcerciseStart)) * 60) / 60)) AS "totalExcerciseTime" from attendance AS a WHERE a.rfidKey = #{rfidKey} AND a.excerciseDay BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT((SELECT ADDDATE(NOW(), - WEEKDAY(NOW()) + 0 )), '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT((SELECT ADDDATE(NOW(), - WEEKDAY(NOW()) + 6 )), '%Y-%m-%d'); SELECT month(excerciseDay) AS "month", equipmentName, Round(if(weightNow, sum(weightNow * countNow), SUM(ROUND((HOUR(TIMEDIFF(endtime, startTime)) * 60 )+ (second(TIMEDIFF(endtime, startTime)) + MINUTE(TIMEDIFF(endtime, startTime)) * 60) / 60))) / COUNT(*)) AS "averageVolume" FROM daily_excercise WHERE equipmentName IN ( SELECT equipmentName FROM daily_excercise WHERE excerciseDay BETWEEN CONVERT( DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 4 DAY), DATE ) and CONVERT(NOW(), DATE) ) and rfidKey = #{rfidKey} AND MONTH(excerciseDay) BETWEEN MONTH(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 4 MONTH)) AND MONTH(NOW()) GROUP BY equipmentName, MONTH(excerciseDay) ORDER BY MONTH(excerciseDay); SELECT DATE_FORMAT(d.excerciseDay,'%y-%m-%d') as "excerciseDay", e.equipmentCategory AS "excerciseCategory"from daily_excercise AS d LEFT JOIN fitness_equipment AS e ON d.equipmentName = e.equipmentName where MONTH(d.excerciseDay) = MONTH(NOW()) AND d.rfidKey = #{rfidKey} GROUP BY d.excerciseDay; SELECT s.equipmentName, s.standardVolume, s.gender FROM standard AS s JOIN user AS u ON s.level = u.level AND s.bodyWeight = ROUND((u.weight)/5) * 5 AND u.rfidKey = #{rfidKey} AND s.gender = u.gender WHERE s.equipmentName IN( SELECT d.equipmentName FROM daily_excercise AS d WHERE d.excerciseDay BETWEEN CONVERT( DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 4 DAY), DATE ) and CONVERT(NOW(), DATE) AND d.rfidKey = #{rfidKey} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance (rfidKey, dailyExcerciseStart, attendanceCheck, excerciseDay) VALUES(#{rfidKey}, NOW(), 1, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE attendance SET dailyExcerciseEnd = NOW(), attendanceCheck = 0 WHERE rfidKey = #{rfidKey} AND excerciseDay = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%y-%m-%d')
mapper.select: SELECT attendanceCheck FROM attendance WHERE rfidKey = #{rfidKey} AND excerciseDay = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%y-%m-%d')
